subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: On Sunday night, the Buffalo Bills, a heavy underdog, will have a chance to seize the attention of the N.F.L. when they play host to the undefeated New England Patriots.
snippet: On Sunday night, the Buffalo Bills, a heavy underdog, will have a chance to seize the attention of the N.F.L. when they play host to the undefeated New England Patriots.
